item.title: Creating "fake" TFS Builds

item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Application Insights for Windows Store Apps in Azure Portal
item.description: If you've been using Application Insights for a while now you would have noticed that with recent Visual Updates the Application Insights SDK had been updated to use a new version that logs AI data into the new Azure Portal. From this if you use Windows Store Apps you would probably have noticed that if you instrument a Windows Store application with the new SDK that you can't actually find your data anywhere although you can see it being logged from the Visual Studio Output window and using Fiddler. The good news is that you will soon be able to have a great experience with the new AI SDK for Windows Store apps as you do for your currently for your web applications, the better news is that below you'll see how to use the new SDK for your Store Apps and see the data in the Azure Portal.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)

item.title: Failover or Restart Results in Reseed of Identity - FIX
item.description: This post has been ported from http://www.sqlservercentral.com/scripts/MS+SQL+2012/93043/ which I then repeated on https://gbeeming.wordpress.com/2013/02/12/failover-or-restart-results-in-reseed-of-identity-fix/.
item.author: website@gordonbeeming.com (Gordon Beeming)
